website_summaries.verdict: Cordless massager with 120 min. run time at full charge. Variety of attachments for customized massage experience.
pros: Comes with triangular, shiatsu, U-shape, and acupressure heads
Versatile enough to use throughout the body, including feet, waist, arms
Ideal for travelers and office professionals who need relief
cons: Can’t use heat function with interchangeable heads

customer_reviews.title: Covinent massager that works great
customer_reviews.text: I have back muscles pain and I go to chiropractor every week. This thing helps the tension of my back muscles. It’s light and the design allows me to reach every corner on my back with one arm. Love it! It comes with three settings. Make sure you don’t use the the strong mode on bony areas. It hurts a lot when it works on bones directly. The heating function is pretty useless. I cannot feel the heat at all, but heat is not what I looked for in this massager so I doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessieth

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend because he has bad neck and back pain. It works really well for him to relieve the tension in his neck. Also, I hate giving massages which is the main reason I got this lol. I’ve used it on myself, which wasn’t hard at all (you won’t strain your arms trying to reach areas on your back), this thing is awesome! After I use it, I feel totally relaxed. It has I believe 4 settings but I use the first because even that’s strong enough. It’s charge last a long time too, and doesn’t die if you don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he likes it so much. It helps for his back shoulder pain so much. It’s lightweight and cordless make it convenient to take it and use it anywhere anytime. The battery is rechargeable and last pretty long. It comes with different heads and have multiple strength. My husband used to use the strongest one. This is a awesome product and I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The massager is easy to use and I can use it to massage any spots like back, leg and shoulders. The strength is adjustable. I like the product. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leyi

customer_reviews.title: too weak!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, this is only 12 Watts. I had one before that was 28 Watts power, and I think that makes a big difference. Also, the heat feature is miniscule and hardly noticeable. It's not very hot. Sorry, I don't like to be Negative Nelly, but I hope to save people from buying the wrong product. You can get a good one, but this is not it, in my opinion. The one I had before that was a Korean brand, called Kim Soo Ja. Anyway, it was stronger and better. It was too heavy to ship so I tried this one, which I am now sending back for a refund. Save yourself the trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis M Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than 6 months, too late for Amazon help
customer_reviews.text: While great at first, this product will not stay on, even when fully charged. We gave it as a Fathers Day present, and it has been used once a week or less, so not much at all. We are not pleased at all with the durability or product quality. Also a bit loud.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lord

customer_reviews.title: One of the massager heads cut my skin :(
customer_reviews.text: This massager cut me. The head with the three little modules on it. I cannot figure out how it did it but it literally put punctures into my skin. I thought I was getting some stinging from leaving the heat in one area too long but the best wasn't even on. It just peeled my skin off in some spots. It's pretty painful. I'm really shocked and annoyed that this happened. The massager itself seems ok but keeps shutting off and the holes in my skin aren't deep enough to bleed but they are deep enough to sting and scab over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is my third massager and it is really good to my mom waist. It is very easy to use too. I may touch the “stop” button when I am using it. I will give 5 stars if it is solved.
customer_reviews.author: Gongde C.

customer_reviews.title: No heat, no percussion massager
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to replace one that broke and was really looking forward to the heat element. Unfortunately, I didn’t feel any heat from the unit. It did massage, but as I was coming from a percussion massager it just didn’t feel strong enough. Even though it’s listed as a percussion massager, it’s not. It is definitely a vibrating massager. I returned and paid the extra for the device I owned previously.
customer_reviews.author: M@l

customer_reviews.title: It's a "Me- Sage"
customer_reviews.text: If you have back pain, this is a must. I have purchased two of these. The first one that I purchased, I have had for nearly a year. It works fantastic and really helps with my back pain. The great thing is that it is wireless. It's not too heavy. The charging takes a couple hours but will last for multiple uses. This massager has multiple mode and intensity settings. It also has a red light option to theoretically accelerate the healing process. I don't use the attachments for anything because the red ball seems to work the best. I believe it's worth every penny. You will be lucky to find another at this quality for this price point!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Grammo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far...my initial rating is good, will see in time how the charge holds but so far so good. The only complaint I have is the controls. It doesn’t take much to set off the buttons and I find myself having to turn it back on all the time. Could maybe use a cover over it so you don’t accidentally change the setting. Absolutely love the acupuncture and the curved attachments. The massage settings are great as well. As long as the massager holds up, I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great for sore muscles.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for sore muscles, had a different kind that just hurt and was ineffective, this has different attachments that make it work for a variety of muscle pains. I do wish the “heat” option actually got warmer.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaG

customer_reviews.title: Great Power. Decent heat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who works 10h days at a factory. He always has joint and musclea pain. I was afraid this would not have enough power but it has tons of power. Also love that you can use the heat setting without the massage on. helps relax tired hands and feet. I do wish the heat setting had a little more heat. I personally dont use it because even at the lowest setting it hurts but for my husband who needs an elbow to the back to feel anything , its great.
customer_reviews.author: Kupins

customer_reviews.title: Not a heavy duty massager
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very powerful massager. While it is an adequate percussion massager it is not a heavy duty deep tissue massager. I would spend more money for an upgraded version that can really work on deep tissue.
customer_reviews.author: German Juggernaut

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This product works good. I can't use it on my neck because it gives me a terrible headache. Its just a vibrator with pulses for your neck and back. If I push it in deep to my shoulder and back it does a good job of breaking up knots and muscle tightness. Just can't use for neck or head as it really hurts. Not bad for the price but not great either.
customer_reviews.author: JoeSacramento

customer_reviews.title: The two percussion settings make this product beneficial for various symptoms.
customer_reviews.text: My husband's legs have always cramped up and sometimes I am unable due to arthritis to massage them. This product has truly helped him. I also suffer from Sciatica and a stiff neck and my visits to the chiropractor have been reduced. I am very happy with this product. I have only one suggestion for those who have chronic pain. I prefer to use a heating pad before using this. The heat works pretty good but I find to be really effective, loosening the muscles with heat beforehand works best.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Linda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t recharge, one time use, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after the first charge , this unit did not recharge. It is completely non functional . Also the massage head is hard shiny plastic, not the best interface for soft tissue in the body
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Item!
customer_reviews.text: There are many massagers on Amazon. I have several of them. This is by far one of the best ones I've bought. It's rechargeable and works for 120 min. It has four attachments which makes it really good at reaching different parts of the body, not just the back. You can use it on your feet pain, on your am for carpal tunnel. The options are endless with multiple attachments. I has three different massage settings and it heats up very fast. It comes with a two-year warranty. For this price, if it breaks after two years I would buy this same item.
customer_reviews.author: Judine

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and Osteoporosis and have had bad pains lasting all day. I was unable to massage my back or apply CBD oil without assistance, but 20 minutes with it relieves my 12 hours. It is light enough for me to use, and the length is perfect. It works great on my calves where I have strong cramping. My only complaint is that it is very powerful, and I use the lowest power setting (perhaps because my BMI is less than 20), and op for the most mild variable massage style, but like many things, maybe I will grow into these.
customer_reviews.author: John Streck

customer_reviews.title: Effective heated massage device that works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective heated massage device that provides welcome relief to lower back muscle spasms resulting from a failed back surgery some 15 years ago. While I have and have tried several other types of heated massage devices, only this device provides the much needed massaging and heat without it feeling like it is trying to drill through my spine. I like this product very much, if you will try it maybe you will like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Old Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Worth at least twice the price! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Like others said the power button is a little tricky, and the heat takes a while to kick in, but it's so good for the price otherwise! I like the weight of it, I like that it's rechargeable and cordless. It has a good looking design, and the tips are useful. The controls are easy to understand. It is durable, and powerful. Also, it's pretty quiet compared to the machine my chiropractor uses, and has comparable results. Winner! And you just might find you get a coupon for a free gift unexpectedly in the box! Snailax is really doing this thing well!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Grey

customer_reviews.title: Good massager Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a percussion massager but most of them are out of my price range. I found the Snailax massager because I was looking for a massager with heat. This one fits the bill. It's nice that it's cordless and the battery charge lasts a pretty long time. I like the heat feature although I wish that it was a little bit stronger. It doesn't feel like a true percussion massager from the physical therapist's office but it is a good massager for the price. The three settings are good and I have achieved some significant pain relief and relief with trigger points and soft tissue by using this massager so I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Godsent, well almost.
customer_reviews.text: I love my thumper, the solution to the stiffness and soreness and achiness that comes from hard bicycling while old. Actually, mainly from being old. The hard bicycling only make it a bit more of an issue. I thump pretty much all over, other than the obvious place to avoid, even the soles of my feet. You can take the word of a 76 year old, out of shape man who started bicycling after a 25 year hiatus. I give my thumper some of the credit for being able to got on nearly daily rides of up to 50+ hard miles.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Believer
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of what the massager would be for the price. After several days with it, I’m a believer. It is as good as massagers that cost 2 to 4 times what I paid for my snailax and those do not have the heat feature. I have had contact with customer service as part of registering for my 2 year warranty and they have been helpful and responsive. Yes, you read it correctly... snailax has a 2 year warranty. I highly recommend this massager.
customer_reviews.author: Lorel Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great massage, nice heat element, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have been suffering from chronic back & neck pain for years, but then a friend told me about this personal massager! It works the knots out of my neck & mid back perfectly, I couldn't be happier! It's slick, feels good in the hand, not too head-heavy, and I can really feel and enjoy the heating element! The attachments are very nice too, I like using them particularly on my lower back, thighs and legs! A lot of my daily discomfort has noticeably diminished since I started using this product, & its only been about a week!! Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Saul

customer_reviews.title: Damn That's Strong
customer_reviews.text: I've been having some muscle tightness in in my shoulder and neck area. Heating pads helped, but I needed something to press against the muscle. I bought this massager and it's been perfect! There's 2 snap-ons that I use and it is damn strong. If I max it out, I can feel it almost knock some wind out of my lungs. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tambrin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this massager. It really gets in there and even though there's only three speed settings it's way more than enough on high. The only thing that could be a little better is when you turn the heat on you can't really feel it but I can use a heating pad for that. I bought this one and one that was double the price and I chose this one even though the other one had more settings. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my complaining husband who was always asking me to massage or pop his back. I didn’t know if he’d like it whenI bought it but turns out he LOVES IT. He uses it all the time and it’s very easy to hold and use. We also got another product similar and higher price similar to this one but he still preferred this one because of ease and functionality. We have not had any issue with the attachments (though my husband doesn’t care for them) and the intensity doesn’t slow as a precaution which is great because the other product that went for a higher price did that for some reason .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT AND EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I ordered this product, and it lived up to what I read. I bought it to try to massage a numb area that resulted from a bad surgery with hopes that I can rid the numbness with massage. I also have bad shoulder problems that I couldn't reach, and this unit can reach it and help with the pain. I have bought out massage units and they did nothing. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Peonie

customer_reviews.title: Get one!!  You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: This is our new favorite device! We literally use it every night. We use it 3 times a day sometimes and may need to get another so we don’t fight over it. It really works and massages out all the knots in our muscles. Even when we don’t have problem areas, it is so relaxing!! We’ve told our family and friends and they’ve ordered them too and love it! Can’t recommend it enough!!
customer_reviews.author: KMo679

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Live Without It
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having chronic back pain issues and I desperately needed something to help ease the pain and discomfort I’ve been experiencing with my back. I’ve been going to therapy and they used a deep tissue massager. The ones they use at the clinics are far too expensive and the snailax one I purchased does a good job. I love how I can reach areas if I can’t have someone to massage me and it comes with different attachments and settings to make the massage experience comfortable. I’ve had it for more than a month and I’ve had no issues! I definitely recommend this brand for others.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cordless massage, it is very versatile. I'm a runner and it works well on : my knees, lower back, ankles and my back. My only issue is that the different parts come out may times while using it and that's annoying. Also, the heat is barely working you don't feel it. A little noisy as well. Highly recommend, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: FAITH

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it gets a little heavy for me because I have arthritis. But I use it on the muscle in my leg because when I broke my hip and had to have pins replaced because they was rubbing on the muscle which messed it up. I have been doing therapy and the therapist said to use it on the muscle to help stretch it out again. It has been working really good. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Pavek

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent massager!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is amazing! I usually get regular massages, but due to the pandemic I’ve been unable to. Snailax to the rescue! It’s super easy to use and super effective. It has multiple settings and several different attachments, so you can find the best combination that works for your specific aches and pains. Some of the reviews complain that the heat function doesn’t actually get hot. In my experience, it builds to a nice warming sensation. It’s not going to replace a heating pad but if you’re targeting a stubborn knot, the combination of the warmth and percussion seems to really help. I can’t recommend this massager highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Pinched nerve
customer_reviews.text: I woke up with a pinched nerve from my neck to my fingers. I went to my chiropractor and had his treatments. I used this alternating with a heat pad when I worked bc typing and the mouse were excruciating, that’s what caused it. I used this thing like crazy and after about a week combined with the chiropractor I was good. Complete amazement!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great back and shoulder cordless massager
customer_reviews.text: I have the Snailax cordless handheld back massager since Last February. I decided to buy this massager because it was highly recommended by a majority of users in their comments. And since then I have been very satisfied with its operation. It helps me a lot with my back and shoulder pain. I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F

customer_reviews.title: Even the dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Our family uses it all the time, even the dog enjoys it. My partner and I both spend a lot of time outdoors and he uses it all the time on his calves. We also use it on the lower setting on our dog’s shoulders, hips, and lumbar area. Warming feature not strong but noticeable. Comes with many attachments. I’ve had family members order this product (for themselves and their dogs) after using ours. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Helps with leg cramps
customer_reviews.text: A leg injury from years ago has resulted in giving me leg cramps at night. I love the accupuncture massage head attachment - it really does the job. I also love that it is cordless. The only criticisms I have are that it takes a while for the heat option to heat up and that it's a little awkward to hold so it's easy to hit the switch off or change to another speed by mistake. Otherwise it has really helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Cordless is great to avoid getting all wrapped up
customer_reviews.text: Cordless is wonderful, no worries about finding an outlet. Great for shoulder tension or back pain and the cordless option means no more getting all wrapped in the cord when you are changing sides. Strong enough and stays powered long enough for each session. Heated option is useful, and one of the attachments is softer, but some of the harder attachments are still puzzling for use.
customer_reviews.author: bluchez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This massager work very well. Heating function help me muscle more relaxing. I like so much. I will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: We highly recommend this Snailax Back Massager!
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I both often have back, hip, and leg pain and have had spinal surgery and ongoing sciatica. My physical therapist used a very similar massager on my back, but is that one cost close to $100. I found the Snailax on Amazon and it has great reviews, so I ordered one at their very reasonable price. We both love it! It's easy to use and the amount of relief we get is wonderful. Sure saves trips to our massage therapist or occasional chiropractor. Really! We're both very physically active and the Snailax Massager is a blessing. You'll be glad you got one.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne K.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Product works amazing used it when it arrived. Bought it for my husband since he has back pain and he manfioned it helped his pain tremendously. Love how it has different settings a high medium and low levels.
customer_reviews.author: berenice castelan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Rechargeable Massager!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is an excellent product. It provides plenty of power for massaging any area of the body, and it is a great value at this price point. Out includes 4 attachments, but I prefer using it without attachments and making using the heat. If I could suggest any improvements, it would be to offer more power for heat and the ability to select different power levels for heat. However, you can't beat this massager at this price point. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a massager.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor May

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Helps relax my back muscles and the heat setting adds the finishing touch. Although it is a little top heavy I’ve found I can hold the handle with one hand and maneuver it where I want it with the other. The only thing I really don’t like is the control buttons are right where I hold it so I often accidentally switch settings or turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this massager to replace a different brand that stopped charging. This one is much quieter than the old one, and is very effective at massaging sore muscles. I haven't tried all the attachments yet, but the heat function works well. It's a very mild heat, but I like it. I also like the different settings, even though I have used the high setting most. I expect to use this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Very effective.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent massage tool. Appreciate the red light n gentle heat feature. It works very effectively when working out targeted areas. Overall, this is a really good body health and helpful tool. Do though, wish it would charge faster and could be a little lighter in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great Massage
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! It has different attachment for amazing massages and it has a long handle so I can massage my own back and reach my trouble spots on my shoulders and neck. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo M. Lofton

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need for relief!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to help with the aches and pains I have been having in my upper back, shoulders and neck. This feels so good and I am able to reach my entire back because the curved handle is the perfect length. The heat is not so hot, but I got it for the massage not the heat. I recommend this to anyone who needs a massage after a workout or a long day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Baxter Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is no cheap toy. Very sturdy feel. Easy to use. Very straight forward operation. The price is perfect and customer service is snappy. I love this thing. It really helps with aches and pains. The heat feature is wonderful. So many settings. Very happy with my purchase! Thanks Snailax!
customer_reviews.author: Shaman Global

customer_reviews.title: Works great when you’re in oain
customer_reviews.text: first heat didn’t work, but user error and now it’s akk good, make sure and read the manual.
customer_reviews.author: justnc

customer_reviews.title: Great value for medium pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Needed something to help relieve shoulder pain from sleeping wrong on my side. Device arrived quickly and worked great out of the box. Massager has a decent head weight that is good for applying pressure. Heat feature is nice bonus Providing additional pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Wardo

customer_reviews.title: Love the handle, works well, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like this massager a lot. First, the handle is great for back use, unlike the gun style massagers. Also, the price was very reasonable. This machine is pretty powerful, but I gave it four stars because I feel the heat element is only ok. It gets warmish. Overall, very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S. Butera

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: Not enough power, even in the highest setting the vibration doesn't go deep enough into the muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Rol Rod

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This device is easy to use and battery power doesn't go out fast, the attachments are easy to attach and its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: LADIES Your welcome !
customer_reviews.text: Great massage love that its cordless . Great different settings. Powerful. speaking of powerful side note ... accidentally fell in between my legs one day and oh my God!!!!! I don't think Amazon is a type of place to leave The type of review I want to leave for its other benefits . Ladies must buy!!!! and make sure it accidentally falls in between your legs thank me later!
customer_reviews.author: violet villasenor

customer_reviews.title: Feel Great Massage
customer_reviews.text: We are new to handheld massagers but we had nothing to worry about. All of the attachments are easy to put on and really add to the massage. The curved attachment is great on calves and thighs. I especially like the many settings and the heat mode is heavenly on the neck and shoulders. While it is nice to have someone give you a massage it works just as well if you are alone as the long handle gives you plenty of reach.
customer_reviews.author: Cowin Convert

customer_reviews.title: Worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have already recommended this product to everyone on my social media platforms! I love this thing! Only con about this massager is that it's heavy and the battery life is short. Other than that, it's perfect and I use it on my legs and back everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Breonna

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is one of the best back and body massagers I have ever used. It’s nice and intense and has a number of different types of tips you can put on for different uses. This a great to use if you are having pain from working out or getting swoll. My only complaint is where the on/off button is. If you are doing your back sometimes you accidentally turn it off due to how close it is to the grip, other than that it’s great! I love the heat function. It is my favorite massager!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M.

customer_reviews.title: No Heat
customer_reviews.text: The massager worked well but never gave out any heat I was disappointed with that but everything else was fine
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Well-built massager for the whole body
customer_reviews.text: I've been suffering from backpain for several months now and have tried several other products including a cane massager, however, none have worked as well as this cordless. The massager is weighted well so you can easily apply pressure to shoulders and back. Cordless is also a plus as it can be used almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: It hurts!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many vibrators and they never increased pain. The vibration is extreme even on low. Very disappointed,
customer_reviews.author: Julia Mann

customer_reviews.title: .Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Keeps turning off while using. Want to love it but truthfully it’s annoying and clumsy
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Hits the right spots...
customer_reviews.text: This is 5 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ across the board!!! This is so good that we had to get 2, because our kids are always taking it from us. It works out pain that you didn't even know you had. Its durable, long lasting battery, comes clean and ready to use. Love the different head options. Pop it on, twist it around, and watch your body fell better now.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Marie

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Effective muscle tension releif
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from muscle tensions for years and used multiple products like this. This one is solid and the arch helps you hit your back a lot better. I use it in conjunction with a yoga routine which seems to potentiate the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Interchangeable massage heads are versatile
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an older, plug in hand-held massager. I really like the cordless, rechargeable feature. It is just as powerful as my old plug-in was. The five different massage heads make it much more effective on various areas of the body. I even use the "acupuncture" adaptor for scalp massage. Appears to be very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Massager/ Heat doesn’t really work
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best massagers I’ve ever owned. I love the power and the different heads that come with it. The only thing is that the heat options does not really work. The amount of “heat” is very minimal (the reason I purchased it) but other than that it’s a great massager.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel good after
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I've noticed is I dont feel the heat and the unit is pretty heavy. Had it running for like 20 min and felt no heat. Only reason I gave it 4 stars. Aside that I feel amazing after first usage. Havent had a chance to verify battery length.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for cordless
customer_reviews.text: Great massager! I was a little let down when I realized it was cordless as they’re usually not as powerful as the corded ones. This massager is just as powerful as the corded ones and with the different heads, I’ll be able to work out all my stiff and sore muscles
customer_reviews.author: D_&_B

customer_reviews.title: Intense
customer_reviews.text: It is intense, even with the lowest setting it is powerful, so if you want a strong massager this is it. I just use it on the lowest setting. They provide 4 different massagers so you can pick which one you like. I like that it is cordless. I barely got it so I don't know if it will help with pain relief. It is easy to use, but a little heavy but manageable for me, but again I am a petite person. And the best part is it comes with a 2-year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Navjot

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for pain
customer_reviews.text: It’s an excellent product. It’s bit heavy for my hand if I use on my back but I like it the way it feels on my tired muscles after days work in a factory. I also massaged my head with it and felt much relief from headache.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied. It barely heats up and is not as strong as I had hoped it would be. The battery only last about 45 minutes before it started to die. Heavier than I thought and my arm gets tired from using it on my shoulder and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Grey

customer_reviews.title: Great massager for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this massager to replace an old one that no longer held a charge. The price of this massager was a few dollars lower than the old one so my expectations were not too high. After using the massager for the past few days I have been pleasantly surprised as to how well it works. It heat feature works great and battery life last long enough for thorough massage.
customer_reviews.author: armando

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! During this stressful time I find my neck and shoulders very tight and painful after work. This helps a lot relieving my tension. I am small 100 lbs 4 ft 11 inches this is a little to big for me but I get used to it. The heat feature is not so noticeable to be honest. But for what it’s worth, this is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to so many ppl I should get paid!
customer_reviews.text: I charged this once when I got it... I use it all the time and barely charge it... I love this product so much I literally convinced my best friend her mom and our other best friend to buy their own! And they have! They love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L Minor

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Completely dead after 5 months and now I’m stuck with it and unable to return or exchange it, was good while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Singh

customer_reviews.title: wow! it works
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't understand as long as I was going to physical therapy I had no problem with my lower back because they used a similar machine. So I brought one just to see if it worked on my problem. Well, it's not as bad, and this machine works. The only drawback is where the on and off button location. Must be careful or you will turn it off without trying.
customer_reviews.author: me me knight

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine Mate
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. I don’t have too much experience with it as it’s new. Myself, mom, and sister used it for various reason. My mom works at the hospital so this is good with muscle discomfort in lower back and legs because she standing for long periods. My sister used it for lower back discomfort brought on dysmenorrhea. Since massager parlors are closed this isn’t a bad substitute. I use it for old track injuries that still bother me around my knee. It is just a bit heavy; however, it aids in performance of the device in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Myles

customer_reviews.title: Eases back, shoulder and anywhere there's pain
customer_reviews.text: This massager works absolutely great. I never really considered vibration helping me in any way but man it really eases my back pain and shoulder pain. It also helps my wife's sore shoulders and lower back pain. The wand works great, is easy to use and so far lasts long per charge. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Darrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Works mostly as described, wish the heat was hotter
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a full 5 stars but the heat option I couldn't feel. Everything else functions properly and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: I received my product in October and loved it! About a week ago, it stopped working even after a full charge. Unfortunately, I've missed the return window so it looks like I'm stuck with a useless massager.
customer_reviews.author: yolomyles

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is really good. I use it on my legs, stomach and back. I love The different attachments. My boyfriend works in construction his muscles are always sore. he was a little jealous that he spent a lot of money for his and mine work better than his lol
customer_reviews.author: MsBlaque121

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have neck and shoulder pain. I use this at night and it seemingly helps the pain levels enough to get to sleep faster. I haven't had it long enough to rate the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back pain and muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: The device really helps with muscle pain in the body. I purchased it for my mom and she says she loves the feel of the massage. The battery life is great and lasts long. One negative is that the device is somewhat heavy. Hopefully this device lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: Mash

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: The BEST little massager!! Used it at my cousins house and was in love and ordered mine that night. I suffer from tension advances and knots in my neck from studying and this little tool does the trick!! Will be ordering one for my dad for Christmas!! The best one on the market!! I love all the different heads it comes with to get every part of your body!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Single Head Massager
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly with the heat or with one of the attached heads. I need a single massage head to work a particular area in my shoulder and it works well for that. Great purchase and have already recommended this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product may not have as much power as other products
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease and use of the product. Has multiple functions and easy attachments for different uses and body parts. I like the heat function and long handle to get to a lot of other areas that may be harder to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Really like this but does not heat up
customer_reviews.text: The vibration and attachments are great on this back massager. My husband and I have both found relief using this but we specifically purchased it because of the heat element and neither of us can feel it. The vibrations are good and strong enough to relieve some deeper back pain that we both experience.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I just got it. Took it out of the box 😍💓 OMG the best thing. Feel amazing 😍 💯 so happy I bought it. Can't wait to see all it can do. Didn't even use the attachments
customer_reviews.author: REAL

customer_reviews.title: Good for temporary relief
customer_reviews.text: So far this item has worked well the heat function works good it’s not hard enough to burn you but it is hard enough to feel it. As far as the battery life goes we’ve used around one hour and still haven’t had to charge it. Pain relief is good only issue is some of the attachments aren’t the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sore Shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my mother. She is disabled and has difficulty moving around. She spends a lot of time in a recliner, and often gets sore shoulders. The cordless feature is particularly nice, since she can use it without having to get up to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I bought this massager. It was just what I was looking for. The U-shaped attachment is my favorite. I needed something to soothe my sore forearm muscles after tennis and it does just that! It feels amazing and I love the heat as well. It's a great massager. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been helping my neck and upper back pain. Using it regularly seems to be preventing the build up of tension that I normally get. And it relaxes the muscles when they are tense. It seems well made, especially for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I returned this immediately. Heat is barely there, my hands were warmer than this. Attachments rattled when attached. Deep tissue is a joke this unit is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE AND HIGH QUALITY MASSAGER
customer_reviews.text: Super happy and satisfied with this product! I have a lot of knots on my shoulder blades and tense muscles on my arms and this product helped me in a span of 2 days!!!! I love how there are different modes and massage heads targeted for your needs. Thank you, Snailax!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The attachment heads are a bit stiff and can hurt and the heating function is just a joke but otherwise its a nice product. They offered to send me a pillow for lime 30 cents. I paid the 30 cents but never recieved the pillow lol.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making a quality product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I pulled a muscle a few weeks ago wearing a ridiculously high pair of heels. This hand held massager helps loosen it up with perfect percision massaging. I especially like the multiple speeds and modes with the different attachments. Also i have purchased this product before and they stand behind their warranty 100 percent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F

customer_reviews.title: The best Massager....EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: My old massager finally went out...and I had been looking to purchase a new one. The most important thing for me was the price and that I could use it plugged in or as a portable massager. I used it immediately (it was already charged) and got to experience it's portability and easy to use attachments. I love how I can use it inside or out of the house. I can charge it and use it almost anywhere...I really love this item and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to relieve some neck and shoulder pain I was having and am so glad I gave it a try. Wasn’t sure cordless would be powerful enough but it is plenty strong and has been very successfully in reducing the pain I was experiencing. Nice set of attachments and seems to be well built. I suffer from occasional headaches and there is a scalp attachment that I am sure to try the next time I have a problem. I would say I bought this because of the low price but am pleasantly surprised at what I got for the money! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: R B. Vann

customer_reviews.title: Great balance of soft and power
customer_reviews.text: Love the different modes. I can be a gluten for punishment, so they have a great burst mode that really helps get the kinks out. My gf is not a gluten for punishment, so the lower settings are perfect for. My favorite attachment is this rounder half moon shape that is just amazing for leg and arms. I’ve been using after runs and is so nice. Great bang for you buck
customer_reviews.author: Ben Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great massager for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's sore back. He felt relief within the first time we used it. The massager had decent power to it and he was able to feel the heat function that some people mentioned they were not able to feel.
customer_reviews.author: KMC

product_meta.title: Snailax Cordless Handheld Back Massager - Rechargeable Percussion Massage with Heat, Deep Tissue Massager for Neck Shoulder Waist Leg Foot Back Pain Relief, Portable Wand Massager for Full Body
feature_bullets: CORDLESS & RECHARGEABLE -The hand held massager is powered by rechargeable lithium-ion battery. No need to plug in while in use. It’s compact, cordless that allows you to massage anywhere on-the-go. You can enjoy the massage at home, office, or car, airplane and on the long trip, etc. anywhere & anytime. (The battery can lasts for approx. 80mins on a full charge, and it is safe to use while charging)

PERCUSSION MASSAGER - The massagers for neck and back is built in powerful vibration motor that can produce a very good deep tissue percussion massage. It relieves pain by putting mild pressure on the knots and sore muscles which brings relaxation through out the body.

HEAT THERAPY - The back massager has a heated massage feature,sooth away aches and pains daily in the comfort of your own home at any time using the heat,infrared light. It will spread warmth on the body to effectively relax tension and knots that built up in your muscles throughout the day.

VERSATILE USE- The massager with heat features 4 interchangeable massage heads, 3 automatic massage modes and 3 adjustable speed settings, allowing you to customize and modify each massage stage to your liking. It provides a soothing massage for every part of the body and can be applied to the neck, shoulders, back, waist, arms, legs, feet, etc. to relieve muscle tension, soreness, aches and pain.

IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT - This handheld body massager is lightweight and compact design, it will be a perfect Christmas gift or birthday gift to your loved ones, to your wife, mum,father, friends,etc. Whether you experience lower back pain, sore calves, or tight thighs, this massager can help you to feel your best.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
